name: Modern Turkey
description: This seminar examines the history and politics of Turkey since 1923. It explores issues such as the Ottoman roots of Turkeyâ€™s early leadership, the establishment of the republic, Ataturkâ€™s reforms and legacy, internal political and social transformations, and the countryâ€™s changing geopolitical role. The course also explores some aspects of Turkish literature and culture. No knowledge of Turkish is required.
